name: Mystery Solved!
description:
Core gameplay mechanic is overcoming obstacles and solving puzzles that are introduced in the form of clues. 

The main character of the game is the witness. The charecter is not selectable or randamised before the start of the game.

The main character will run after the murderer finding clues about the murder and the victim as well as the murder weapon.

There will be predefined route that the main character of the game will be running. The game will be over when the withness catches the murderer: The murderer can be caught after three puzzles are solved and 10 obstacles are encountered. 

There is a risk of losing life when the player cannot avoid an obstacle. when loosing life, the game level starts over.
